title: The Man Whose Fiancées Were Stolen from Him by the Hero, Is Picked up by the Goddess - Novel Updates
tags: Goddesses   Heroes   Netorare   Nobles   R-15   Revenge   Royalty
author: Rin Sanguu   三宮 琳
description:
Ray Orlost, a boy who lived a blessed and happy life is devastated when his fiancées are stolen by the newly awakened hero.

He desperately tries to finish his life but at that moment⋯ ⋯.

He is visited by the goddess.>
